english_example_sentence: If we had added a little more salt to that dish, it would have been delicious.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы мы добавили немного больше соли в то блюдо, оно было бы вкусным.
turkish_example_sentence: O yemeğe biraz daha tuz ekleseydik, lezzetli olurdu.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: O yemeğe biraz daha tuz ______, lezzetli olurdu.
